solution_line_template: the minimum is {min_weight_increase} more than {standard_robot_weight} so {standard_robot_weight}+{min_weight_increase}=<<{standard_robot_weight}+{min_weight_increase}={minimum_weight}>>{minimum_weight}
the maximum weight of a robot is twice the minimum {minimum_weight}*{max_weight_multiplier}=<<{minimum_weight}*{max_weight_multiplier}={maximum_weight}>>{maximum_weight}
